ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 24
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/10/99 2:57:04 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Not sure about the AC an such. The complaint I have heard from mages is that their pets are
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/10/99 2:57:04 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
geertges@... writes:

> If you are referring to the post by Geoffry, then I believe he said
> mages get the best variety. Skeletons are second in hps only to the mages
> Earth elemental. What I don't think he mentioned is that while Skeletons
> may have few hps in this case, they _do_ have a much higher AC that earth
> elementals, thus making them more powerful over all.

Not sure about the AC an such.

The complaint I have heard from mages is that their pets are not as well
behaved They tend to NOT attck when they should be attacking. So even if
they have a better pet... it won't do what it should.

Sonoroud
